name: Petzl Leopard Leverlock FIL Crampons
description: With a lightweight design and a low profile purpose-built to be packable, these svelte crampons are engineered for fast ski touring and snow travel. Remarkably lightweight Cord-Tec linking system uses burly cords to link the heel and toe sections, resulting in a crampon that's incredibly packable.Aluminum toe and heel sections reduce overall weight.10 points design optimized for snow travel and ski touring, not ice.Cord-Tec technology uses lightweight and ultra-strong Dyneema cord to connect the front and heel pieces together.Leverlock FIL binding fits boots with toe and heel welts.Fits boot sizes 36-46 (replacement Cord-Tec allows for use with larger boot size).Tool-free adjustments boost convenience and minimize weight.Protective carry bag included.CE and UIAA certified.
